channel.name: MigrationChannel
channel.description:
This channel will attempt to read the records from the HRS database in a dependency aware way. Though XForms has no notion of dependency, there is an inherit dependency betweens update forms. The dependenc looks like: Individual -> Visit -> Location
Moreover, the entry point of searching is Visit, since one is always created, whether a new location or not. Then a check is made to see if a Location was created during the visit. After that check, all update forms are checked. In the end, a list will be in order of: Location - Optional, only if the visit is at a new location not already registered Visit Any events...

step.name: Pregnancy Outcome Transform

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
